priorVersion.title: CDISC Questionnaire FACT-COG Version 3 Test Code Terminology

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C166184

self.title: CDISC Questionnaire FACT-COG Version 3 Test Code Terminology

definition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Cognitive Function Version 3 test code.
name: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Cognitive Function Version 3 Questionnaire Test Code
preferredTerm: CDISC Questionnaire FACT-COG Version 3 Test Code Terminology
synonyms: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Cognitive Function Version 3 Questionnaire Test Code

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Cognitive Function Version 3 - Perceived Cognitive Impairments: I have had trouble forming thoughts.
terms.preferredTerm: FACT-COG Version 3 - I Have Trouble Forming Thoughts

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Cognitive Function Version 3 - Perceived Cognitive Impairments: My thinking has been slow.
terms.preferredTerm: FACT-COG Version 3 - My Thinking Has Been Slow

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Cognitive Function Version 3 - Perceived Cognitive Impairments: I have had trouble concentrating.
terms.preferredTerm: FACT-COG Version 3 - I Have Had Trouble Concentrating

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Cognitive Function Version 3 - Perceived Cognitive Impairments: I have had trouble finding my way to a familiar place.
terms.preferredTerm: FACT-COG Version 3 - Trouble Finding Familiar Place

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Cognitive Function Version 3 - Perceived Cognitive Impairments: I have had trouble remembering where I put things, like my keys or my wallet.
terms.preferredTerm: FACT-COG Version 3 - Trouble Remember Where Put Things

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Cognitive Function Version 3 - Perceived Cognitive Impairments: I have had trouble remembering new information, like phone numbers or simple instructions.
terms.preferredTerm: FACT-COG Version 3 - Trouble Remembering New Info

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Cognitive Function Version 3 - Perceived Cognitive Impairments: I have had trouble recalling the name of an object while talking to someone.
terms.preferredTerm: FACT-COG Version 3 - Trouble Recalling Name of Object

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Cognitive Function Version 3 - Perceived Cognitive Impairments: I have had trouble finding the right word(s) to express myself.
terms.preferredTerm: FACT-COG Version 3 - Trouble Finding Right Words

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Cognitive Function Version 3 - Perceived Cognitive Impairments: I have used the wrong word when I referred to an object.
terms.preferredTerm: FACT-COG Version 3 - Used Wrong Word When Refer Object
synonyms: FAC075-Used Wrong Word When Refer Object

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Cognitive Function Version 3 - Perceived Cognitive Impairments: I have had trouble saying what I mean in conversations with others.
terms.preferredTerm: FACT-COG Version 3 - Trouble Saying What I Mean

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Cognitive Function Version 3 - Perceived Cognitive Impairments: I have walked into a room and forgotten what I meant to get or do there.
terms.preferredTerm: FACT-COG Version 3 - Walked Into a Room and Forgotten
synonyms: FAC075-Walked Into a Room and Forgotten

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Cognitive Function Version 3 - Perceived Cognitive Impairments: I have had to work really hard to pay attention or I would make a mistake.
terms.preferredTerm: FACT-COG Version 3 - Work Hard to Pay Attention

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Cognitive Function Version 3 - Perceived Cognitive Impairments: I have forgotten names of people soon after being introduced.
terms.preferredTerm: FACT-COG Version 3 - Forgotten Names After Introduced

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Cognitive Function Version 3 - Perceived Cognitive Impairments: My reactions in everyday situations have been slow.
terms.preferredTerm: FACT-COG Version 3 - Reaction Everyday Situations Slow

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Cognitive Function Version 3 - Perceived Cognitive Impairments: I have had to work harder than usual to keep track of what I was doing.
terms.preferredTerm: FACT-COG Version 3 - Work Harder Than Usual to Track
synonyms: FAC075-Work Harder Than Usual to Track

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Cognitive Function Version 3 - Perceived Cognitive Impairments: My thinking has been slower than usual.
terms.preferredTerm: FACT-COG Version 3 - My Thinking Slower Than Usual

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Cognitive Function Version 3 - Perceived Cognitive Impairments: I have had to work harder than usual to express myself clearly.
terms.preferredTerm: FACT-COG Version 3 - Work Harder Than Usual to Express
synonyms: FAC075-Work Harder Than Usual to Express

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Cognitive Function Version 3 - Perceived Cognitive Impairments: I have had to use written lists more often than usual so I would not forget things.
terms.preferredTerm: FACT-COG Version 3 - Use Written Lists More Often

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Cognitive Function Version 3 - Perceived Cognitive Impairments: I have trouble keeping track of what I am doing if I am interrupted.
terms.preferredTerm: FACT-COG Version 3 - Trouble Keeping Track Interrupted

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Cognitive Function Version 3 - Perceived Cognitive Impairments: I have trouble shifting back and forth between different activities that require thinking.
terms.preferredTerm: FACT-COG Version 3 - Trouble Shifting Back and Forth

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Cognitive Function Version 3 - Comments From Others: Other people have told me I seemed to have trouble remembering information.
terms.preferredTerm: FACT-COG Version 3 - Told Me Trouble Remembering Info

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Cognitive Function Version 3 - Comments From Others: Other people have told me I seemed to have trouble speaking clearly.
terms.preferredTerm: FACT-COG Version 3 - Told Me Trouble Speaking Clearly

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Cognitive Function Version 3 - Comments From Others: Other people have told me I seemed to have trouble thinking clearly.
terms.preferredTerm: FACT-COG Version 3 - Told Me Trouble Thinking Clearly

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Cognitive Function Version 3 - Comments From Others: Other people have told me I seemed confused.
terms.preferredTerm: FACT-COG Version 3 - People Told Me I Seemed Confused
synonyms: FAC075-People Told Me I Seemed Confused

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Cognitive Function Version 3 - Perceived Cognitive Abilities: I have been able to concentrate.
terms.preferredTerm: FACT-COG Version 3 - I Have Been Able to Concentrate
synonyms: FAC075-I Have Been Able to Concentrate

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Cognitive Function Version 3 - Perceived Cognitive Abilities: I have been able to bring to mind words that I wanted to use while talking to someone.
terms.preferredTerm: FACT-COG Version 3 - Able to Bring to Mind Words
synonyms: FAC075-Able to Bring to Mind Words

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Cognitive Function Version 3 - Perceived Cognitive Abilities: I have been able to remember things, like where I left my keys or wallet.
terms.preferredTerm: FACT-COG Version 3 - Able Remember Things Where Left

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Cognitive Function Version 3 - Perceived Cognitive Abilities: I have been able to remember to do things, like take medicine or buy something I needed.
terms.preferredTerm: FACT-COG Version 3 - Able Remember to Do Things

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Cognitive Function Version 3 - Perceived Cognitive Abilities: I am able to pay attention and keep track of what I am doing without extra effort.
terms.preferredTerm: FACT-COG Version 3 - Able to Pay Attention Without Effort
synonyms: FAC075-Able to Pay Attention w/o Effort

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Cognitive Function Version 3 - Perceived Cognitive Abilities: My mind is as sharp as it has always been.
terms.preferredTerm: FACT-COG Version 3 - Mind Is as Sharp as Always Been
synonyms: FAC075-Mind Is as Sharp as Always Been

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Cognitive Function Version 3 - Perceived Cognitive Abilities: My memory is as good as it has always been.
terms.preferredTerm: FACT-COG Version 3 - Memory Is as Good as Always Been
synonyms: FAC075-Memory Is as Good as Always Been

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Cognitive Function Version 3 - Perceived Cognitive Abilities: I am able to shift back and forth between two activities that require thinking.
terms.preferredTerm: FACT-COG Version 3 - Able to Shift Between Activities

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Cognitive Function Version 3 - Perceived Cognitive Abilities: I am able to keep track of what I am doing, even if I am interrupted.
terms.preferredTerm: FACT-COG Version 3 - Able to Track What I Am Doing
synonyms: FAC075-Able to Track What I Am Doing

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Cognitive Function Version 3 - Impact on Quality of Life: I have been upset about these problems.
terms.preferredTerm: FACT-COG Version 3 - Been Upset about These Problems

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Cognitive Function Version 3 - Impact on Quality of Life: These problems have interfered with my ability to work.
terms.preferredTerm: FACT-COG Version 3 - Problems Interfered Ability Work

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Cognitive Function Version 3 - Impact on Quality of Life: These problems have interfered with my ability to do things I enjoy.
terms.preferredTerm: FACT-COG Version 3 - Problems Interfered Ability Enjoy

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Cognitive Function Version 3 - Impact on Quality of Life: These problems have interfered with the quality of my life.
terms.preferredTerm: FACT-COG Version 3 - Problems Interfered Quality Life

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Cognitive Function Version 3 - Perceived Cognitive Impairments: Subscale score.
terms.preferredTerm: FACT-COG Version 3 - Cognitive Impairments Score

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Cognitive Function Version 3 - Comments From Others: Subscale score.
terms.preferredTerm: FACT-COG Version 3 - Comments From Others Score

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Cognitive Function Version 3 - Perceived Cognitive Abilities: Subscale score.
terms.preferredTerm: FACT-COG Version 3 - Cognitive Abilities Score

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Cognitive Function Version 3 - Impact on Quality of Life: Subscale score.
terms.preferredTerm: FACT-COG Version 3 - Impact on Quality of Life Score
synonyms: FAC075-Impact on Quality of Life Score
